name: JLPT N5 Meaning Quiz
instructions: Choose the number of the most correct meaning!

cards.question: 後
answer: afterwards, since then, in the future

cards.question: 五日
answer: five days, the fifth day (of the month)

cards.question: 伯父/叔父・さん (おじ・さん)
伯母さん/叔母さん (おばさん)
降りる (おりる)
answer: to alight (eg from bus), to get off

cards.question: ～階 (～かい)
answer: counter for storeys of a building

cards.question: 借りる (かりる)
answer: to borrow, to have a loan

cards.question: 聞く
answer: to hear, to listen, to ask

cards.question: 着る (きる)
answer: to wear, to put on (from shoulders down)

cards.question: ください
answer: (with te-form verb) please do for me

cards.question: 曇る (くもる)
answer: to become cloudy, to become dim

cards.question: 消す (けす)
answer: to erase, to delete, to turn off power

cards.question: 九日
answer: nine days, the ninth day (of the month)

cards.question: 困る (こまる)
answer: to be worried, to be bothered

cards.question: 差す (さす)
answer: to raise (stretch out) hands, to raise (eg umbrella)

cards.question: 吸う (すう)
answer: to smoke, to breathe in, to suck

cards.question: 十日
answer: ten days, the tenth (day of the month)

cards.question: 七日
answer: seven days, the seventh day (of the month)

cards.question: 並ぶ (ならぶ)
answer: to line up, to stand in a line

cards.question: 並べる (ならべる)
answer: to line up, to set up

cards.question: ～日
answer: ～ day of the month, for ～ days

cards.question: 寝る (ねる)
answer: to go to bed, to sleep

cards.question: 乗る (のる)
answer: to get on, to ride in, to board

cards.question: 入る
answer: to enter, to contain, to hold

cards.question: 二十日
answer: twenty days, twentieth (day of the month)

cards.question: 二日
answer: second day of the month, two days

cards.question: 三日
answer: three days, the third day (of the month)

cards.question: 持つ (もつ)
answer: (1) to hold, to carry, (2) to possess

cards.question: 休む
answer: to rest, to have a break, to take a day off

cards.question: 郵便局 (ゆうびんきょく)
八日
answer: eight days, the eighth (day of the month)

cards.question: 留学生 (りゅうがくせい)
渡す (わたす)
answer: to pass over, to hand over

cards.question: 渡る (わたる)
answer: to cross over, to go across
